i1.name: Gathering Fire
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Karma''' reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|2 to 5 for 3|1 to 11}} seconds for each enemy {{tip|champion}} she damages with an [[Champion ability|ability]], or by 1 second whenever she uses her [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} against them.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Karma reduces Mantra's cooldown by 1 to 11 â€’ undefined seconds for each enemy champion she damages with an Champion ability, or by 1 second whenever she uses her basic attacks on-hit against them.
i1.notes:
* {{ai|Inner Flame|Karma}} / {{ai|Soulflare|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per target hit (for a total of {{pp|2*5 to 5*5 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds if 5 enemy champions are hit at once).
* {{ai|Focused Resolve|Karma}} / {{ai|Renewal|Karma}} reduces {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown per tick (for a total of {{pp|2*2 to 5*2 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds for the entire duration).
* {{ai|Inspire|Karma}} / {{ai|Defiance|Karma}} does not reduce {{ais|Mantra|Karma}} cooldown (it has no damage component).

r1.name: Mantra
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karma''' empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
'''Karma''' begins the game with one rank in ''Mantra''.
''Mantra can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
Karma begins the game with one rank in Mantra.
Mantra can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
r1.notes:
*''Mantra'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Mantra's'' bonus effects are added on top of '''Karma's''' basic abilities.
